job.title: Information Technology System Administrator
job.description: REDiTECH (Red-Eye-Tek)  Our Mission “We strive to deliver a truly remarkable service that provides our Clients the ability to utilize technology in reliable and innovative ways.”  Our Vision: To merge technology and security to solve intricate business problems for all companies.  Our Values: Act like an OWNER Have a GROWTH mindset HONESTY is non-negotiable INTEGRITY is our most valuable asset Show DEDICATION in all tasks Approach all problems with CREATIVITY  Where We Are Today: We are currently in a rapid growth pattern and we are looking for solid team players that want to come along for the ride. Technical skills are a given for a System Engineer, but we are also looking to bring on technicians with great personalities, positive attitudes, and an unshakable drive to succeed. We are growing and evolving and that type of environment will keep you on your toes. If you are motivated by growth, problem solving, and accountability we want to hear from you!  Job purpose: Systems Administrators will provide and demonstrate high level of customer service and ensure client satisfaction of service. Systems Administrators will be responsible for maintaining and accurately documenting all work within service tickets, as well as technical documentation for the office and their equipment. We are looking for a competent Systems Administrators to provide fast and useful technical assistance on computer systems. You will answer questions on basic technical issues and offer advice to solve them. The goal is to create value for clients that will help preserve the company’s reputation and business.  Responsibilities: · Front line documentation · Service Tickets, Knowledgebase Articles, Site Configuration Changes · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing PC and Mac workstations · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing Windows Servers · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing Remote Management Software · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing Microsoft Active Directory · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing LANs/WANs/WLANs · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing routers, switches, Firewall policies, configurations, and management · Installation, troubleshooting, repairing, and managing Network Security, Disaster Recovery Configuration, and DNS Configurations · Proactive monitoring of alerts, patch management, health checks, administration/maintenance of remote monitoring systems, and disaster recovery solutions · Support issues related to internal and network infrastructure, Virtualization Services with VMware, support services for Microsoft Related Technologies, Remote Access Solutions, and Network Level Support for LAN/WAN/WLAN · Work with Clients and Team to complete Support Tickets · Assist special projects team for client deployments · Provide onsite and remote assistance as needed · Provide verbal and/or written training sessions/documents such as “how to” guides for troubleshooting and/or user guides for our internal Teams and external Clients  Qualifications: · Positive attitude · A desire to contribute · Motivation to grow personally and professionally Top Candidates Will Have A Combination Of Some Or All Of The Following Skills · 3+ years’ experience with Microsoft and Mac Workstation Operating Systems or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ Experience with Microsoft Office, Internet Browsers, Mobile applications or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ experience with Microsoft Active Directory, Disaster Recovery Configuration, and VMware or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ experience with LANs/WANs/WLANs or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ experience with routers, switches, firewall policies, configurations, and management or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ experience with Network Security, Disaster Recovery, Configuration, and DNS Configurations or equivalent work experience · 3+ years’ experience Customer Service (IT related field preferred) or equivalent work experience · ConnectWise Experience  Job Type: Full-time Pay: $50,000.00 - $70,000.00 per year
